title: You little notifier tray thing still isn't working right and is getting worse
body:
Sometimes I get nothing (usually I get this when I first come to the beta boards).  Sometimes I get a large version of my icon.  Sometimes it switches between the first two and ends on one or the other.  And on rare occasion I get the tray I'm supposed to.  

Whatever code you guys did to originally make feature, something is screwing with it.  I really like it so I hope you all can fix it soon.

replies.body: Hey Linna, can you screenshot this the next time you experience it? Definitely want to get this fixed for you and anyone else who's having the same issue. The screenshot would go a long way into helping us tackle the problem.
Awesome, thank you. I've passed this on to the devs!

> Here's the pics
> 
> http://i.imgur.com/O10wliA.jpg

Hey Linna! I see you are trying to solve the case of the missing elements! Let's see if I can help you at all. Here's a couple of questions for you (just to verify it's not on your end):

1. Which browser are you using?
2. Can you provide a list of extensions and plugins currently loaded into your browser?
3. When the page loads, are there any errors shown in the javascript console? Read below if you aren't sure how to check this.
----------------
How to view your console:

On Chrome:

* View > Developer > Developer Tools
* Click the Console tab

On Firefox:

* Tools > Web Developer > Web Console
* Click the boxes next to Net, CSS, and logging to disable them

I'm using Firefox 32.0.3

>Using //@ to indicate sourceMappingURL pragmas is deprecated. Use //# instead jquery.min.js:1
Use of getPreventDefault() is deprecated.  Use defaultPrevented instead. jquery.min.js:3
Using //@ to indicate sourceMappingURL pragmas is deprecated. Use //# instead jquery.min.js:1
Use of getPreventDefault() is deprecated.  Use defaultPrevented instead.

plug ins:
Adobe Acrobate
Adobe AAM manager
Amazon MP3 downloader
Java Deployment Toolkit 7.0.600.19 which FF is blocking because firefox hates java (and I made sure to update java)
2 MS office things
2 nvidia 3d things
Shockwave
